ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Using simple input, this package creates plots of gene models. Users can create plots of alternatively spliced gene variants and the positions of mutations and other gene features.
Using simple input, this package creates plots of gene models. Users can create plots of alternatively spliced gene variants and the positions of mutations and other gene features.

name: r-genemodel
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-genemodel
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/genemodel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/genemodel/genemodel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 16890467ddbaa6584e2842a0191b2b08eef2b53375c3973de45a6c17d334d6f4

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-stringr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-stringr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('genemodel')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('genemodel')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/greymonroe/genemodel
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Using simple input, this package creates plots of gene models. Users can create plots
    of alternatively spliced gene variants and the positions of mutations and other
    gene features.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - jenzopr

# Package: genemodel
# Title: Gene Model Plotting in R
# Date: 2017-02-20
# Version: 1.1.0
# Authors@R: person("J Grey", "Monroe", email = "greymonroe@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: Using simple input, this package creates plots of gene models. Users can create plots of alternatively spliced gene variants and the positions of mutations and other gene features.
# Depends: R (>= 3.2.5)
# Imports: stringr
# License: GPL-2
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 5.0.1
# URL: https://github.com/greymonroe/genemodel
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2017-02-20 17:05:28 UTC; greymonroe
# Author: J Grey Monroe [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: J Grey Monroe <greymonroe@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2017-02-20 19:09:06
